unit.name: Lord
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Gromril armour.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Daemon Slayer
unit.description: Equipment: Slayer Axes. Special Rules: Unbreakable, Slayer, Ward Save (5+).

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Runelord
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Gromril armour. Special Rules: Runelore.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Battle Standard, Hand weapon and Gromril armour.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Thane
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Gromril armour.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Runesmith
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Gromril armour.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Dragon Slayer
unit.description: Equipment: Slayer Axes. Special Rules: Unbreakable, Slayer, Ward Save (6+).

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Master Engineer
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Gromril armour. Special Rules: Artillery Master, Entrench, No Leader.

equipment.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

unit.name: Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Block (shield) .

unit.name: Quarreller
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbow and light armour.

unit.name: Thunderer
unit.description: Equipment: Dwarf Handgun and light armour.

unit.name: Longbeard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Block (shield), Immune to Panic, Old Grumblers.

unit.name: Hammerer
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Stubborn, Bodyguard.

unit.name: Ironbreaker
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, Gromril Armour and shield. Special Rules: Block (shield).

unit.name: Ranger
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbow, great weapons and light armour. Special Rules: Scouts, Light Infantry.

unit.name: Miner
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Underground Advance.

unit.name: Troll Slayer
unit.description: Equipment: Slayer Axes. Special Rules: Unbreakable, Light Infantry, Slayers.

unit.name: Irondrake
unit.description: Equipment: Drakegun and Gromril Armour. Special Rules: Light Infantry.

unit.name: Bolt Thrower
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Bolt Thrower.

unit.name: Grudge Thrower
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Grudge Thrower, Dwarf-crafted.

unit.name: Dwarf Cannon
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Dwarf Cannon, Dwarf-crafted.

unit.name: Flame Cannon
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Flame Cannon.

unit.name: Organ Gun
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Organ Gun.

unit.name: Gyrocopter
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker, Steam Gun, Bombs.

mount.name: Anvil of Doom
mount.description: Warmachine: 2 Guards. Equipment: Hand weapon, Gromril Armour and shield. Special Rules: MR (2), Stubborn, Anvil of Doom. The following runes are engraved in the Anvil of Doom. Only one of these Spell Runes can be used in each magic phase. These Spell Runes cannot be lost through a miscast. -Spell R. of Lead PM 3/5+: Hex, Range 36", target suffers -2M and -2I until the casters next magic phase. -Spell R. of Lightning PM 3/5+: MM, Range 36", 2D6 hits S4 -Spell R. of Strength PM 3/5+: Augment, Range 36", target gets +1S until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Ancestor Rune
item.description: Unit is Stubborn on a 4+ when taking its first break test in the game. One use only.

item.name: Artillery Master
item.description: Instead of shooting in the shooting phase this model may guide one of the following artillery pieces within 3": - Bolt Thrower: may use the BS of the Artillery Master - Grudge Thrower: may reroll Artillery Dice - Dwarf Cannon: inflicts D3+1 wounds - Organ Gun: reroll 1s for to-hit rolls - Flame Cannon: reroll 1s for to-hit rolls (Template) If this model is hit by ranged attacks it may transfer hits to a friendly warmachine within 3" on a roll of 4+ per hit. This works like the Look Out Sir! rules (see chapter Characters in the core rules).

item.name: Bolt Thrower
item.description: Range 48", S6, D3 wounds, no AS, penetrates ranks

item.name: Bombs
item.description: Instead of shooting in the shooting phase the model may drop bombs in the Remaining Moves phase. To drop bombs the model may target one enemy unit it did fly over in the movement phase. Place the centre of the 3" template anywhere on the actual flight path of the model over the targeted unit. Then scatter the template D6". On a roll of a 6 the model suffers a misfire (like a warmachine) and the bomb causes no damage. On a 1-5 scatter the template in the direction indicated by the scatter die. If the scatter die results in a hit symbol, then the template does not scatter. Every model hit by the template (use template to hit rules) suffers a S4 (S8 for the hole) AP (1) hit. The model cannot shoot in the shooting phase in the turn it dropped bombs.

item.name: Brace of Drakefire Pistols
Brace of Drakefire Pistols (for Champion)
item.description: Range 8", S5, multi shot (2), always stand and shoot, counts as additional hand weapons, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot, long range and moving and shooting Brace of Dwarf Pistols: Range 8", S4, AP(1), multi shot (2), always stand and shoot, counts as additional hand weapons, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot, long range and moving and shooting Dwarf Cannon: Cannon, Range 60", S10, no AS, D3 wounds

item.name: Brace of Dwarf Pistols (for Champion)
item.description: Range 8", S4, AP(1), multi shot (2), always stand and shoot, counts as additional hand weapons, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot, long range and moving and shooting

item.name: Drakegun
item.description: Range 18", S5, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot, magical attacks

item.name: Dwarf Handgun
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), move or fire, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot

item.name: Dwarf Pistol
item.description: Range 8", S4, AP(1), always stand and shoot, no -1 modifier for stand and shoot, long range and moving and shooting

item.name: Dwarf-crafted
item.description: If this model/unit suffers a misfire and the dwarfen player chooses the option Ignore, he may add +1 to the roll.

item.name: Dwarfen Magic Resistance
item.description: enemy spells that target Dwarfen units suffer -1 to the casting roll

item.name: Entrench
item.description: After deployment pick one artillery piece: counts as being in hard cover and defended obstacle. This benefit is lost when the warmachine moves.

item.name: Flakksons Rune of Seeking
item.description: +1 to to-hit rolls (incl. Templates)

item.name: Flame Cannon
item.description: Flamer Weapon, Rage 12”, S5, AP(1), D3 wounds. Units that suffer one or more losses musst pass a panic test.

item.name: Gromril Armour
item.description: 4+ AS

item.name: Grudge Rune
item.description: Eternal Hatred vs 1 nominated (after deployment) character or monster model (stacks)

item.name: Grudge Thrower
item.description: Catapult, Range 12"-60", 3" Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds

item.name: Hatred (Greenskins)
item.description: All Dwarfs hate all kind of Greenskins.

item.name: Loner
item.description: Model cannot be the army general. Can only join Slayer units.

item.name: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad
item.description: No AS

item.name: Master Rune of Balance
item.description: In the enemy magic phase take one of your opponents PD and add it to your DD. (only for Runelords)

item.name: Master Rune of Breaking
item.description: Hit destroys opponents magic weapon

item.name: Master Rune of Challenge
item.description: At the start of enemy turn pick one unit within 20" that could normally charge the bearer and is not Immune to Psychology. The Unit has to charge the bearer or cannot move voluntarily that turn and army/unit cannot use any Ld bonuses from character models within that unit (includes general and BSB). One use only.

item.name: Master Rune of Defense
item.description: The warmachine counts as being in hard cover and defended obstacle. This benefit is lost when the warmachine moves.

item.name: Master Rune of Disguise
Master R. of Disguise
item.description: The warmachine counts as being in hard cover. In addition, an enemy unit can only trace line of sight to the model if the distance between both units is less than D6x6". Roll at the start of every phase for each unit that would need LOS. If failed, the unit may choose another target, i.e. does not count as a failed charge for example.

item.name: Master Rune of Dismay
item.description: All enemy units take Ld test at end of Dwarf turn. If failed units cannot charge next turn. Units that are Immune to Psychology or use compulsory movement are not affected. One use only.

item.name: Master Rune of Fear
item.description: Unit causes Fear

item.name: Master Rune of Flight
item.description: Can be used in the shooting phase. Range 12", Sniper, hits automatically, effect as if target was hit in cc. weapon returns to wielder. (Cannot be used by Slayers)

item.name: Master Rune of Gromril
item.description: 1+AS, cannot be improved

item.name: Master Rune of Grugni
item.description: Dwarf units within 6" gain Ward Save (5+) vs missiles

item.name: Master Rune of Immolation
item.description: Before combat resolution is calculated, this model may explode. The warmachine is removed as a casualty and all units in combat suffer 2D6 S4 hits, distributed like shooting. (Can also be used in the combat round the warmachine was destroyed).

item.name: Master Rune of Iron
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Master Rune of Kingship
item.description: Dwarf units within 6" are Immune to Panic, Fear and Terror. (only for the army general)

item.name: Master Rune of Kragg the Grim
item.description: Great weapon retains its abilities (and allows additional weapon runes to be engraved on the great weapon)

item.name: Master Rune of Resistance
item.description: Reroll failed armour saves

item.name: Master Rune of Skalf Blackhammer
item.description: Always wounds on 2+, Strength raised accordingly and applies to armour save modifier

item.name: Master Rune of Smiting
item.description: Causes D3 wounds

item.name: Master Rune of Spellbinding
item.description: +1 DD (only for Runelords)

item.name: Master Rune of Spellbreaking
item.description: Dispell Scroll. One use only. (only for Runelords/Runesmiths)

item.name: Master Rune of Spelleating
item.description: Dispel Scroll. On a 4+ BM / 5+ PM the spell is destroyed. One use only. (only for Runelords)

item.name: Master Rune of Spite
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Master Rune of Steel
item.description: Attacks against bearer have max S of 5

item.name: Master Rune of Stromni Redbeard
item.description: +1CR to all friendly units within 12" of banner

item.name: Master Rune of Swiftness
item.description: ASF

item.name: Master Rune of Valaya
item.description: Enemy spells that target Dwarfen units within 12" suffer -2 to the casting roll (for a total of -3). RiP spells and enemy spell effects in play within 12" at start of any magic phase are automatically dispelled/ lose their effect.

item.name: No Leader
item.description: This model may never be the army general. Also units cannot use this models Ld for Ld-tests and this model does not allow a unit to rally below 25%.

item.name: Oath Stone
item.description: Can be used at the start of any turn (even opponents). The bearer and his unit has no flanks and rear (therefore cannot lose rank bonuses by units fighting in its flank or rear) and fights in all directions as if it would fight in to its front (e.g. bonuses that apply only for fighting to the front would apply in all directions). In addition the bearer of the Oath Stone cannot refuse Challenges. These benefits are lost when the unit moves or the bearer is killed. One use only.

item.name: Old Grumblers
item.description: If this unit is not broken, then units within 6" of this unit reroll failed panic tests.

item.name: Organ Gun
item.description: Range 24", S5, AP(1), number of shots = artillery dice x2, no penalty for multiple shots

item.name: PM Spell R. of Adamant 2/5+
PM Spell R. of Adamant 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 6", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: PM Spell R. of Power 2/5+
PM Spell R. of Power 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 6", unit gets AP (1) in cc and rerolls 1s for to-hit rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Spell R. of Swiftness 2/5+
PM Spell R. of Swiftness 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 6", unit gets +2M and +2I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Relentless
item.description: All Dwarfs are allowed to march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Rune of Accuracy
item.description: May reroll scatter die

item.name: Rune of Battle
item.description: +1 CR (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Brotherhood
item.description: The bearer gains +1M and may deploy in a unit of Rangers or Miners according to their respective special rules.

item.name: Rune of Burning
item.description: reroll 1s for to-wound rolls

item.name: Rune of Cleaving
item.description: +1S (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Courage
item.description: Unit is Immune to Fear and Terror

item.name: Rune of Determination
item.description: Unit takes its first break test in the game on 3D6 and ignore the highest die. One use only.

item.name: Rune of Doom
item.description: The bearer may use one additional Spell Rune of the Anvil of Doom in each magic phase. However, each Spell Rune can be used only once per magic phase. (only for Runelords with Anvil of Doom) (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Fate
item.description: Ward Save (2+) vs. first wound. One use only.

item.name: Rune of Fire
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (1) (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Forging
item.description: May reroll misfire result on either to hit or bounce

item.name: Rune of Fortitude
item.description: +1W (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Fortune
item.description: Misfires have no effect other than that the warmachine does not shoot

item.name: Rune of Fury
item.description: +1A (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Guarding
item.description: Bearer gains Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Rune of Luck
item.description: Reroll one failed to-hit, to wound or saving throw. One use only.

item.name: Rune of Might
item.description: Double S vs T5+

item.name: Rune of Preservation
item.description: Immune to effects of Poison and Killing Blow

item.name: Rune of Shielding
item.description: Ward Save (2+) vs missiles

item.name: Rune of Slowness
item.description: Any unit charging this unit has to subtract D6" from its charge range. Multiple runes are not added together - only the single highest roll counts.

item.name: Rune of Snorri Spangelheim
item.description: +1 to to-hit rolls in cc (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Speed
item.description: +1I (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Stoicism
item.description: Unit strength doubled

item.name: Rune of Stone
item.description: +1AS. Max. of 1 per model, exception to Rule of Pride.

item.name: Rune of Striking
item.description: +1WS (stacks)

item.name: Rune of Warding
Rune of Sanctuary
item.description: MR (1) (stacks), max. of 2 per model

item.name: Rune of the Furnace
item.description: Ward Save (2+) vs attacks with the Poisoned Attacks special rule

item.name: Runelore
item.description: +1 to dispel rolls

item.name: Shieldbearers
item.description: Model gets +1AS, as well as 2 additional attacks at WS5 and S4 that do not benefit of any gear or special rules of the model, e.g. runic items. The model still counts as an infantry model with US 1 and therefore cannot be singled out by shooting (under normal circumstances). Also, when this model joins a unit, the unit counts its rank bonus as if the space the Shieldbearers take up was filled with rank and file models. If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Slayer Axes
item.description: Count as additional hand weapons or great weapon, choose before each new combat. Runic Slayer Axes count as runic hand weapons (or runic great weapon in the case of Master Rune of Kragg the Grim) and have to be used as such in each combat, i.e. the character has no choice.

item.name: Slayers
Slayer
item.description: - Deathblow: Each model, that has been killed before it could attack in the combat phase, is allowed to make 1 last attack (1A) with all special rules directed at the model that killed it. Cannot be used versus Impact Hits. - Doom will have to wait: to-wound rolls of a natural 6 inflict D3 wounds instead of 1 - Professional Killer: If the strength of an attack by this model is less than the toughness of the target, the strength of the attack counts as equal to the toughness of the target. - Giant Slayers count as Champions. They are not limited to 1 per unit. - Character models other than Slayers cannot join this unit. - Slayer characters can only join Slayer units. Further, a Slayer character can only be the army general if the army is only composed of units (incl. characters) with the Slayers special rule.

item.name: Stalwart Rune
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Steam Gun
item.description: Breath weapon, S3, AP(2)

item.name: Steamdrill
Steamdrill (for Champion)
item.description: two handed, +3S, ASL, the unit may reroll the arrival for Underground Advance.

item.name: Strollazs Rune
item.description: Unit may triple its movement during a march or charge movement (up to 12")

item.name: Trollhammer Torpedo
Trollhammer Torpedo (for Champion)
item.description: Range 24", S7, D3 wounds, no stand and shoot, magical attacks

item.name: Underground Advance
item.description: This unit may start the game in reserve. Beginning with turn 2, roll a d6 at the start of your turn: on a 4+ the unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit), add +1 to the roll for each turn after the second, a natural 1 always fails.

item.name: Valiant Rune
item.description: Warmachine is Unbreakable

item.name: Giant Slayers
Giant Slayers (all)
Giant Slayers (1x)
Giant Slayers (2x)
Giant Slayers (3x)
Giant Slayers (4x)
Giant Slayers (5x)
Giant Slayers (6x)
Giant Slayers (7x)
Giant Slayers (8x)
Giant Slayers (9x)
Giant Slayers (10x)
Giant Slayers (11x)
Giant Slayers (12x)
Giant Slayers (13x)
Giant Slayers (14x)
Giant Slayers (15x)
Giant Slayer
item.description: Giant Slayers count as Champions. They are not limited to 1 per unit.

rule.leftTerm: Master Rune of Alaric the Mad

rule.name: DW#16
rule.leftTerm: Master Rune of Kragg the Grim

rule.name: DW#39
rule.leftTerm: Master Rune of Kragg the Grim
